alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:57PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Harrison and southwestern Jackson Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gulfport, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Long Beach, St. Martin, D`iberville, Gulf Hills, Gulf Park Estates, Latimer and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 32 and 56. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for southern Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Northern Harrison; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson
